H0.text: Which popular garden flower is the national flower of Mexico, from where it is said to originate. Marigold

H1.text: Which popular garden flower is the national flower of Mexico, from where it is said to originate. Hibiscus

H2.text: Which popular garden flower is the national flower of Mexico, from where it is said to originate. Sunflower

H3.text: Which popular garden flower is the national flower of Mexico, from where it is said to originate. Dahlia

A4.text: The dahlia was declared the national flower of Mexico in 1963.

A5.text: Dahlia is a genus of bushy, tuberous, herbaceous perennial plants native to Mexico and Central America.
